name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior Java Engineer with 8 years of experience, I bring a strong expertise in **Java**, **JVM**, and **Concurrency**, essential for designing and developing high-performance, distributed systems. My technical acumen also includes **Performance Engineering**, focusing on optimizing garbage collection, caching, indexing, and utilizing observability tools to enhance system reliability. I have a proven track record of leading projects that improve scalability and efficiency in both healthcare and financial sectors.
In addition to my backend proficiency, I have hands-on experience with modern technologies like **Python**, **JavaScript/TypeScript**, and **Flutter**, along with frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My in-depth knowledge of cloud solutions on **Azure** and **AWS**, combined with experience in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, allows me to build robust and secure applications while ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. I am also skilled in machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, driving innovation in technology solutions.
